com.localytics.android

Interface MessagingListenerV2

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MessagingListenerV2Adapter

    public interface MessagingListenerV2
    An interface used to receive messaging callbacks. Note, all methods invoked by this interface will be invoked on the main thread. As a result, please ensure that no calls perform any blocking operations.

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • localyticsShouldShowInAppMessage

        boolean localyticsShouldShowInAppMessage(@NonNull
                                         InAppCampaign campaign)
        Callback to determine if an In-App campaign should be shown.
        Parameters:
        campaign - The campaign that will be shown
        Returns:
        The decision to show the In-App campaign.

      • localyticsWillDisplayInAppMessage

        @NonNull
InAppConfiguration localyticsWillDisplayInAppMessage(@NonNull
                                                              InAppCampaign campaign,
                                                              @NonNull
                                                              InAppConfiguration configuration)
        Callback to modify presentation of an In-App Campaign.
        Parameters:
        campaign - An immutable object representing the campaign that will be shown
        configuration - An object representing the mutable visual state of the In-App campaign
        Returns:
        The modified configuration object containing all preferred display values.
        See Also:
        InAppConfiguration

      • localyticsShouldDelaySessionStartInAppMessages

        boolean localyticsShouldDelaySessionStartInAppMessages()
        Callback to determine if In-App campaigns triggered by session start should be shown. This callback is useful for integrations that want to delay presentation of startup campaigns due to the fact that they have some startup state, such as a splash screen.
        Returns:
        The decision to delay in-app campaigns triggered by the "Session Start" event.
        See Also:
        Localytics.triggerInAppMessagesForSessionStart()

      • localyticsShouldShowPushNotification

        boolean localyticsShouldShowPushNotification(@NonNull
                                             PushCampaign campaign)
        Callback to determine if a Push campaign should be shown.
        Parameters:
        campaign - An object defining a Push Campaign
        Returns:
        The decision to show the local notification.

      • localyticsShouldShowPlacesPushNotification

        boolean localyticsShouldShowPlacesPushNotification(@NonNull
                                                   PlacesCampaign campaign)
        Callback to determine if the triggering of a Places campaign should show a local notification.
        Parameters:
        campaign - An object defining a Places Campaign
        Returns:
        The decision to show the local notification.

      • localyticsWillShowPlacesPushNotification

        @NonNull
android.support.v4.app.NotificationCompat.Builder localyticsWillShowPlacesPushNotification(@NonNull
                                                                                                    android.support.v4.app.NotificationCompat.Builder builder,
                                                                                                    @NonNull
                                                                                                    PlacesCampaign campaign)
        Callback to determine if a Push campaign should show a local notification.
        Parameters:
        builder - The Android Notification builder used to customize a local notification.
        campaign - The campaign that triggered the push notification
        Returns:
        The Android Notification Builder with all updated preferences

      • localyticsShouldDeeplink

        @Deprecated
boolean localyticsShouldDeeplink(@NonNull
                                             java.lang.String url)
        Deprecated. Please use CallToActionListener.localyticsShouldDeeplink(java.lang.String, com.localytics.android.Campaign)
        Parameters:
        url - The URL that was triggered inside a Localytics call to action
        Returns:
        The decision to allow Localytics to handle the deeplink
